FwkSenCnt.MEANING: particular type of low-lying grassland on the coasts of Ireland and Scotland

ExCnt.EX: The surf was a distant wash of noise , rolling over the sparkling machair in invisible waves .
The sand dunes and areas of machair on the site are particularly vulnerable to being overused for recreational activities and to unfavourable grazing regimes .
Much of the machair is in a degraded state due to overgrazing and amenity pressure .
